snippet.title: Discounty - Official Release Window Trailer | Wholesome Direct 2024
snippet.description: Discounty is an RPG strategy simulation game developed by Crinkle Cut Games. Manage your own supermarket and organize shelves, check customers out, make local trade deals, and befriend a quirky cast of characters. Salvage a falling shop in the once-thriving town and grow it into a thriving business empire. But be warned: not everyone in town wants you to succeed. Discounty is coming to PC and consoles in 2025.
